channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Scientists Finally Figured Out How Some People Get Drunk Without Drinking
item.description: Gut microbes can make people drunk without booze. Scientists now know which ones to blame.

item.title: « Incroyablement mauvais » : le patron de GOG détruit Windows et encense Linux
item.description: Vous trouvez que Windows 11 devient une usine à gaz publicitaire ? Vous n'êtes pas seul. Le propriétaire de GOG vient de tirer à boulets rouges sur l'OS de Microsoft, qu'il a personnellement abandonné pour… un Mac. Mais la vraie info est ailleurs : GOG prépare sa riposte sur Linux.

item.title: Google’s Next Smart Glasses May Have Actually Learned Something From the Glasshole Days
item.description: If Reddit leaks are anything to go off of, Google Glass 2.0 might have learned a thing or two about privacy and distraction.

item.title: Taiwan Issues Arrest Warrant for OnePlus CEO in Crackdown on Tech Talent Poaching
item.description: Prosecutors allege Pete Lau recruited dozens of Taiwanese engineers without proper government approval.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver : voici les offres immanquables de la deuxième démarque sur Amazon, Fnac, Darty…
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver ont commencé la semaine dernière et nous voici déjà à la deuxième démarque ! Au programme : encore plus d'offres pour des produits Tech à prix cassés, que ce soient les smartphones, les tablettes, les téléviseurs 4K, et surtout les ordinateurs portables, gaming ou de bureautique.

item.title: Bandcamp takes a stand against AI music, banning it from the platform
item.description: "We want musicians to keep making music, and for fans to have confidence that the music they find on Bandcamp was created by humans," the company said.

item.title: Hackers hijack LinkedIn comments to spread malware - here's what to look out for
item.description: As if AI-generated content wasn't enough, phishing has now made it into LinkedIn comments.

item.title: You Won’t Believe Where Scientists Found a 14,400-Year-Old Woolly Rhino Genome
item.description: The stomach of an Ice Age puppy is shedding new light onto the woolly rhinoceros and what—or what didn't—cause these horned giants to die out.

item.title: Skipping this exercise at the gym could be bad for your brain
item.description: Getting swole is great. But cognitive function also improves when you work a certain muscle group. “Never skip leg day” sounds like something a swole gym bro with killer quads might harp on about. But doctors also sing the praises of lunges and split bench squats, and not for the reason you might think.

item.title: Le PlayStation Plus commence très fort 2026 avec Resident Evil, Yakuza et Exit 8
item.description: Voici la première sélection de jeux à intégrer le catalogue du PlayStation Plus Extra et Premium en 2026. Plusieurs gros titres font leur arrivée dans le catalogue comme Resident Evil Village, Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth et Expeditions: A MudRunner Game.

item.title: Nvidia : le DLSS 4.5 arrive sur toutes les cartes RTX avec une option qui change tout
item.description: Nvidia officialise le lancement du DLSS 4.5 pour toutes les cartes graphiques GeForce RTX et en profite pour rendre bien plus pratique son application en jeu.

item.title: HP Omen Max 16 review: a powerhouse gaming laptop at a compelling price
item.description: The HP Omen Max 16 is a powerful gaming laptop that offers excellent performance for a very competitive price - but the design is dated.

item.title: The LG C6 is LG's mid-range OLED TV for 2026 – here's everything we know so far about one of this year's most anticipated TVs
item.description: Here's all the information we have about the LG C6, as revealed at CES 2026, including its two variations and LG's new processor and AI features.

item.title: The first-gen Bose QuietComfort Ultra headphones are $150 off right now
item.description:
The first-generation Bose QuietComfort Ultra headphones are on sale right now for $280, marked down from $430. That 35 percent savings is an even steeper discount than we saw last year Black Friday.
In our review of the first-generation Ultras, we gave them a score of 86 out of 100, noting their best-in-class active noise cancellation (ANC) and comfort. Bose improved its stock tuning for these headphones, which we could immediately tell sounded warmer and clearer. Bose has typically lagged behind the likes of Sony and Sennheiser in raw sound quality, but the first-generation QuietComfort Ult...

item.title: Priyanka Chopra Jonas and Karl Urban's new Prime Video movie The Bluff gets a swashbuckling first trailer — and February looks like it'll be a pirate's life for me
item.description: Amazon has released the first trailer for its new, violent pirate movie The Bluff ahead of its late February debut.

item.title: British Police Used Microsoft Copilot for Faulty Report That Led to Ban on Soccer Team Fans
item.description: Microsoft's AI assistant hallucinated a soccer match.

item.title: China’s trade surplus soared to a record $1.2 trillion in 2025, despite Trump’s tariffs
item.description: This past November, China’s trade surplus topped the $1 trillion mark for the first time, ever. China’s trade surplus surged to a record of almost $1.2 trillion in 2025, the government said Wednesday, as exports to other countries made up for slowing shipments to the U.S. under President Donald Trump’s onslaught of higher tariffs.China’s exports rose 5.5% for the whole of last year to $3.77 trillion, customs data showed, as Chinese automakers and other manufacturers expanded into markets across the globe. Imports flatlined at $2.58 trillion. The 2024 trade surplus was over $992 billion.In De...

item.title: Fitbit, Strava and Nike Training Club are the most data-hungry fitness apps according to a new report — here are 5 ways to protect your privacy
item.description: Surfshark analyzed 16 different fitness apps, and ranked them by most to least data collection.

item.title: Chez SFR, résilier l’abonnement internet coûtera désormais plus cher, sans exception
item.description: Mauvaise surprise pour les clients internet de SFR : désormais, tout le monde est assujetti à des frais de résiliation de 59 €. Jusqu'à présent, tous ceux qui avaient souscrit avant avril 2025 bénéficiaient d'une ristourne de 10 €, mais c'est bien terminé.

item.title: Bill Gates-backed Type One Energy raises $87M ahead of $250M Series B
item.description: Type One Energy has raised more than $160 million from investors to date. The new funding will help the company further refine its stellarator technology.

item.title: Le nouveau MacBook Pro 14 M5 d’Apple est déjà 150 € moins cher grâce aux soldes d’hiver
item.description: Le MacBook Pro M5 fait des merveilles avec des performances en nette hausse à tous les niveaux. Son écran reste une référence sur le marché et son autonomie en fait toujours un bon compagnon. Pendant les soldes, il perd 150 euros et devient déjà plus recommandable.

item.title: The Euphoria season 3 trailer is finally here – and I'm excited for the huge time jump and an even bigger wedding
item.description: Euphoria season 3 has a first look trailer – and it's left me counting down the days to its release date.

item.title: The State of the ‘Star Trek’ Universe Coming Into ‘Starfleet Academy’
item.description: Need a reminder of what's up in the farthest frontier of 'Star Trek' before 'Starfleet Academy'? Class is now in session.

item.title: L’écart s’agrandit : cette alternative à Windows va encore gagner en puissance
item.description: Le logiciel de compatibilité Wine passe à la version 11 et promet de jolis gains en matière de performances.

item.title: Nigeria vs Morocco Free Streams: How to watch AFCON 2025 semi-final online from anywhere
item.description: All the ways to watch Nigeria vs Morocco live streams for FREE from anywhere, as the hosts take on the in-form Super Eagles for a place in the AFCON final.

item.title: Love Pro-Ject decks? Now the firm wants to level up your head-fi game — with a Head Box
item.description: Pro-Ject's new balanced headphone amps promise to get the best from even hard-to-drive headphones

item.title: Amazon partners with Roku to expand its collection of free streaming content – here’s where you can access its 50 new channels
item.description: Fire TV is getting another slew of free streaming channels, now you can watch The Roku Channel without a Roku device.

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs smartphones Xiaomi, Redmi Note et Poco en 2026 ?
item.description: Vous êtes à la recherche d'un guide détaillé des différents téléphones Xiaomi ? Nous avons testé et sélectionné au sein du vaste catalogue les références pour vous aider à choisir le meilleur smartphone Xiaomi, Redmi ou Poco.

item.title: Is a 'poor productivity climate' killing your efficiency? Most workers say returning to the office is making us a lot less productive
item.description: New report uncovers the detrimental effects loud noise and poor air quality can have on worker productivity.

item.title: Robotics software maker Skild AI hits $14B valuation
item.description: Skild AI, which is building general-purpose robotic software, just raised a $1.4 billion funding round led by SoftBank.

item.title: Civilization VII is coming to Apple Arcade
item.description: Sid Meier's Civilization VII is headed to the Apple Arcade on February 5th, allowing you to play the strategy game across your iPhone, iPad, or Mac through the company's $6.99 / month subscription. The game has the same premise as the original PC title, where you're tasked with expanding your empire as historic leaders from […]

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs aspirateurs balais laveurs en 2026 ?
item.description: Les aspirateurs balai laveurs combinent l'aspiration des sols avec un lavage à l'eau propre, qui peut même être combiné avec de la vapeur ou du détergent. Voici notre sélection des meilleurs modèles d'aspirateurs balais laveurs.

item.title: The latest Animal Crossing: New Horizons expansion has arrived earlier than expected
item.description: For a number of very obvious reasons, we don’t want to roll back the clock to early 2020. No thank you. But if there was a feel-good lockdown story, it was the perfectly timed arrival of Animal Crossing: New Horizons, which allowed friends who could no longer meet up IRL to do so virtually on their carefully pruned islands. The game will almost certainly never be as popular as it was back then again, but Nintendo is hoping a good chunk of lapsed islanders will return for its latest DLC drop, which has arrived a day earlier than planned. As spotted by Eurogamer, the free Animal Crossing: New Ho...

item.title: The Mac mini M4 is back on sale for $499
item.description: The holiday season may be behind us, but that doesn't mean you can't still find good deals on some of our favorite tech. Take the Apple Mac mini M4, which is on sale for $100 off. The 17 percent discount gives you 16GB of RAM and 256GB of SSD for $499, which is only about $20 more than its Black Friday sale price. Its beefier models are also on sale: opting for 512GB of SSD will cost you $689, down from $799, while also upping your RAM to 24GB is available for $890, dropping from $999. We gave the Apple Mac mini M4 a 90 in our review thanks in large part to its powerful chip. The M4 works ver...

item.title: Quand Copilot invente le passé : l’énorme boulette de l’IA de Microsoft dans un rapport de police officiel
item.description: Se servir d'une intelligence artificielle capable d'halluciner pour rédiger un rapport de renseignement n'est pas une très bonne idée.

item.title: Parents can put a time limit on YouTube Shorts scrolling
item.description: Parents can now manually set a time limit on their kids' YouTube Shorts feed, ranging from fifteen minutes to two hours (with an option for zero minutes coming soon). The update, announced on Wednesday, takes the Shorts time limit feature YouTube introduced in October and adapts it for under-18 accounts. Kids and teens can't change […]

item.title: Carrefour met en promo un tas de produits Tech durant les soldes : les 12 deals à saisir de la 2e démarque
item.description: La 2e démarque des soldes d'hiver est lancée et Carrefour s’y met en baissant le prix de plusieurs produits high-tech. Des TV aux smartphones en passant par les trottinettes électriques, il y en a pour tous les goûts ! Voici notre sélection des meilleures offres de l’enseigne.

item.title: Gemini can now pull context the rest of your Google apps, if you let it
item.description: Gemini is adding a feature that’s designed to feel more tailored to individual users. Once enabled, "Personal Intelligence" can pull context from across your Google ecosystem, including Gmail, Google Photos, Search and YouTube History, to gain specific insight that will shape its answers and recommendations. Personal Intelligence is available starting today in the US for Google AI Pro and Ultra subscribers. The feature is opt-in only and is off by default. Google Google says users will have the ability to control what apps Gemini pulls from and, in the future, which chats it uses Personal Inte...

item.title: Satellite Data Exposes a Hidden Flood Threat Endangering 236 Million People
item.description: Densely populated river deltas are sinking faster than sea levels are rising, according to new research.

item.title: Trump Doesn’t Need the Proud Boys Anymore
item.description: In a world where ICE agents are shooting US citizens on the street, the need for militias and extremist groups like the Proud Boys to support far-right interests has evaporated.

item.title: Google’s Gemini AI will use what it knows about you from Gmail, Search, and YouTube
item.description: Google's Gemini AI is getting what could prove to be a very big upgrade: To help answers from Gemini be more personalized, the company is going to let you connect the chatbot to Gmail, Google Photos, Search, and your YouTube history to provide what Google is calling "Personal Intelligence." This isn't the first time Google […]

item.title: Gemini’s new beta feature provides proactive responses based on your photos, emails, and more
item.description: Personal Intelligence is off by default, as users have the option to choose if and when they want to connect their Google apps to Gemini.

item.title: Chelsea vs Arsenal Free Streams: How to watch Carabao Cup semi-final 2025/26 from anywhere in the world
item.description: All the ways to watch Chelsea vs Arsenal live streams, as Liam Rosenior looks to crack the Mikel Arteta blueprint in the Carabao Cup semi-final first leg.

item.title: Gemini gets its biggest upgrade yet 'Personal Intelligence' that uses your Gmail, Photos, Search and YouTube history - and it could be our first glimpse of the new Siri in iOS 27
item.description: Gemini's new Personal Intelligence feature is now live, and it gives users an AI personal assistant similar to the one Apple promised Siri would become.

item.title: Voici « Personal Intelligence » : Gemini enfonce le clou
item.description: Google continue la remontada de Gemini avec le lancement de « Personal Intelligence » pour rendre son IA beaucoup plus pertinente et sur mesure.

item.title: Trump Warned of a Tren de Aragua ‘Invasion.’ US Intel Told a Different Story
item.description: Hundreds of records obtained by WIRED show thin intelligence on the Venezuelan gang in the United States, describing fragmented, low-level crime rather than a coordinated terrorist threat.

item.title: This IKEA donut lamp has invaded my dreams, and now I want nothing but to own 12 of them
item.description: A popular IKEA desk lamp gets a major smart and color upgrade.

item.title: Bandcamp becomes the first major music platform to ban AI content
item.description: Bandcamp has built its entire brand around serving artists. And, with the artist furor over AI growing every day, it's no surprise that the company has decided to take a stand against it. In a Reddit post, Bandcamp announced that AI-generated content would not be permitted on the platform and would be subject to removal. […]

item.title: How the Definition of ‘Doxxing’ Is Being Twisted Into a Weapon of Anonymity
item.description: From a journalist's tweet about Venezuela to the identity of the ICE agent who shot Renee Good, the debate over doxxing seems to be everywhere.

item.title: AI security firm, depthfirst, announces $40 million Series A
item.description: The company used an AI-native platform to help companies fight threats.

item.title: Roblox tente la vérification de l’âge et se plante magistralement
item.description: Après de nombreuses plaintes et polémiques, Roblox a décidé de prendre le taureau par les cornes en mettant en place un système de vérification de l'âge. Actif dans de nombreux pays depuis quelques jours, le dispositif n'est pas obligatoire sauf pour accéder aux espaces de discussion de la plateforme. Malheureusement, la vérification de l'âge, basée sur l'analyse vidéo du visage de l'utilisateur, fonctionne très mal....

item.title: US cargo tech company publicly exposed its shipping systems and customer data to the web
item.description: Shipping tech company Bluspark left internal plaintext passwords, including those of executives, exposed to the internet, at a time when hacks in the shipping industry are on the rise.

item.title: Pew! Pew! YouTuber Builds Sound Laser That Works as ‘Invisible Speaker’
item.description: Don't sell your hi-fi just yet.

item.title: GoFundMe campaign for Ford worker TJ Sabula quickly tops $90K in latest politically charged fundraiser
item.description: The crowdfunding platform is increasingly finding itself at the center of major political news stories in the early weeks of 2026. A GoFundMe page is raising thousands to support a worker at the Ford Rouge Plant in Dearborn, Michigan, after he openly criticized President Trump—to his face.

item.title: Python libraries used in top AI and ML tools hacked - Nvidia, Salesforce and other libraries all at risk
item.description: The bugs have been fixed, so users should patch now, experts warn.

item.title: How to do an in-depth portfolio review with these 8 steps
item.description: Take these key steps to make over your portfolio. If you’d like to do a thorough review of your portfolio and plan, here are the key steps to take. I recommend doing them over a series of sessions, not all at once.
